effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.
flavor_text.platinum: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.
